title: How do you deal with a break wall
body: So typical bronze talk here yadayada, So how do you deal with a brick wall running through your entire team, taking all your cc then one shotting your carry and walking out while taking out a few others at the same time? Like i dont see any counter play to being one hit by a tank, like how do you deal with this in solo queue when everyone is out for their own scores? Please higher elo senpai's teach me

replies.body:
Best thing to do is to try to build to fight the tanks.

This means informing your team to build anti-tank items. For mages a {{item:3165}} + {{item:3151}}  and for ad champs {{item:3153}} + {{item:3033}} / {{item:3036}}. Because people go defensive and start tilting if they are told what to do (especially in bronze/silver) throw a little **XD, XP, :)** after telling them what to build.

You are an ADC main, and one of your best champs is Vayne- the ultimate F U to tanks. [Practice your kiting](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fep9ueGvUDA) (vayne is A+ at kiting). 

I think the hardest issue you are facing is getting your team to peel sufficiently (lets face it, nobody is going to peel for you). Consider [making/joining a premade team](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) so you can communicate with them and work on the skills necessary on being successful in the tank meta.

Good luck ♥
You're a legend, Thanks so much
